mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.merchant_id AS "merchantId", a.employee_id AS "employeeId", a.operate_function AS "operateFunction", a.operate_behavior AS "operateBehavior", a.operate_time AS "operateDate", a.current_ip AS "currentIp", a.operate_old_data AS "operateOldData", a.operate_new_data AS "operateNewData", a.header_user_agent AS "headerUserAgent", a.request_url AS "requestUrl"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO merchant_operation_log( id, merchant_id, employee_id, operate_function, operate_behavior, operate_time, current_ip, operate_old_data, operate_new_data, header_user_agent, request_url ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{merchantId}, #{employeeId}, #{operateFunction}, #{operateBehavior}, #{operateDate}, #{currentIp}, #{operateOldData}, #{operateNewData}, #{headerUserAgent}, #{requestUrl} )
mapper.update: UPDATE merchant_operation_log SET merchant_id = #{merchantId}, employee_id = #{employeeId}, operate_function = #{operateFunction}, operate_behavior = #{operateBehavior}, operate_time = #{operateDate}, current_ip = #{currentIp}, operate_old_data = #{operateOldData}, operate_new_data = #{operateNewData}, header_user_agent = #{headerUserAgent}, request_url = #{requestUrl} WHERE id = #{id}
